snippet.title: Academia: School Simulator Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Academia: School Simulator is a cheerful yet challenging management game from the artist of Prison Architect! 

Build a high school with fantastic facilities like science labs, basketball courts, and art rooms, or do the bare minimum and live off government subsidies! 

Will you offer your delinquent students counseling, or simply send them to detention to let them waste their lives away? Will you hire the best teachers or cheap out and build giant classrooms with a 1:100 teacher to student ratio? Will you build enough toilets, or snicker as your students are forced to relieve themselves in the bushes? The choice is yours!

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

ParadoxExtra - http://youtube.com/ParadoxExtra
Gameplay of our video games, convention coverage, and other fun things from Paradox!

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK2, EU4, HOI4, Stellaris, and Imperator.
